case.name: D.Va's Wager
case.description: D.Va proposes a side-bet that the loser obeys the winner.

markers.marker: Hana invites big fan Saki for a playdate.
Hana tells Sakura that standing out gets you run down.
Hana has multiple lines which accuse other players of cheating.
Hana acknowledges Akko's bunny-themed transformation.
D.Va gets her attention via a mech.
Hana tells Marinette about Widowmaker.
Hana makes a pussy pun once while dressed as a black cat.
Hana askes Marinette if she put her bodysuit on with a paint roller.
Hana has a body too perfect for snack foods.
Hana brings up Widowmaker to Marinette.
As a gamer, Hana likes getting a high score.
Hana doesn't need shoes to kick your butt.
Hana heard that Lucio is playing at "Inner City Spectacle" tonight.
Hana obsevers that Marinette is an art student.
Some characters react to Hana saying she needs a hug via Hana using an alsoPlaying. This marker will replace that method in the future.
Hana can sometimes call other players "noobs".
Hana asks if Raven heard loading narration.
Saki reminds Hana of her days at the Academy, a skin she has in Overwatch.
Everyone has a Halloween skin to unlock, even zombie Sakura.
Hana asks if Sakura is an omnic (a robot).
Hana tells Sakura that standing out gets you run down.
Hana must_masturbate when only two players are left, meaning she placed second.
Hana: 1, Sonya: 0.
Hana jousts with Sonya.
Hana is getting into the "stripping party".
Hana mistakes Seven of Nine for Moira, her Overwatch adversary.
If Hana is first to lose, she will mention the side bet in her final defeat line.
If Hana is naked with a bad hand after making her bet, she will express some regret.
If Hana gets an okay or good hand and has lost no clothing in the sixth round, she'll propose a side bet that the first loser does anything the winner asks.
Hana brings up the side bed with Meia.
Meia has lost first, so Hana brings up the side bet.
Used to track whether the female_human player has removed even a single item.
Used to track whether the male human player has removed even a single item.
Set per-target to allow D.Va to dynamically change nicknames for a character.
